DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , non-randomized study evaluate performance MyoScience Tissue Remodeling Device treatment glabellar line ( frown line ) , lateral orbital line ( crow 's foot ) , frontalis line ( horizontal forehead line ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study MyoScience Tissue Remodeling Device Facial Rejuvenation
DOC.criteria: The subject must female 30 70 year age . The subject must clinical examination prior treatment include assessment hyperdynamic line severity . The subject must wrinkle rating least `` 1 '' rest one follow treatment area ( glabellar , lateral orbital , frontalis ) . The subject must sign informed consent form . The subject undergone facial cosmetic procedure level cheekbone within past 6 month . The subject participate facial cosmetic research study . The subject regular regimen prescribe overthecounter anticoagulant . The subject infection skin problem injection site . The subject history facial nerve palsy . The subject mark facial asymmetry . The subject ptosis . The subject excessive dermatochalasis . The subject deep dermal scarring . The subject thick sebaceous skin . The investigator unable substantially lessen facial line physical separation . The subject history neuromuscular disorder . The subject undergone prior surgery alters subcutaneous anatomy area treat . Subjects laxity canthal tendon and/or lower lid retraction , subject recruit zygomaticus major muscle animate crow 's foot . The subject physical psychiatric condition investigator 's opinion would warrant exclusion study prevent subject completing study .
